arcade.vis

Class GrowthVisualization2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • sim.display.GUIState
      • arcade.vis.Visualization
        • arcade.vis.GrowthVisualization2D
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GrowthVisualization2D.Hexagonal, GrowthVisualization2D.Rectangular

    public abstract class GrowthVisualization2D
extends Visualization
    Extension of Visualization for 2D simulations.

    GrowthVisualization2D creates three panels:

    • agents shows the location, state, and age of cell agents
    • environment shows the concentrations of the molecules and location of sites
    • auxiliary shows additional views including volume, density, and energy deficit at locations and the distribution of cell populations
    Since:
    2.2
    Version:
    2.3.14

        public GrowthVisualization2D(Simulation sim)
        Creates a Visualization for 2D simulations.

        Constructor creates a new ColorMaps object that corresponds to simulation specific ranges of cell age, cell volume, and molecule concentrations.
